questions.questionText:
Insert a new entry into Student table with following data
sID = 863, sName = Harry, GPA = 3.7, sizeHS = 1000
Find all the students who didn’t applied for any college
Update GPA of all the students by adding 0.1 to the original GPA
Find all the students who have applied to colleges present in ‘CA’ state
Delete all apply entries where cName is MIT
